Package com.oracle.coherence.spring.configuration.support

Class CoherenceAnnotationUtils

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.coherence.spring.configuration.support.CoherenceAnnotationUtils
public final class CoherenceAnnotationUtils extends Object
Provides utilities for retrieving annotations from the provided InjectionPoint.
Since:
3.0
Author:
Gunnar Hillert
